title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. F, pt. 4401 - State Gaming Commission

State Regulations
§ 4401.1 - Form of commission decision, directive or order
§ 4401.2 - Amendment of this Part
§ 4401.3 - Decision, directive or order of immediate necessity
§ 4401.4 - Disputes

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. F, pt. 4401

Statutory authority: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and

Breeding Law, §§ 101, 104[1], [19], 128; L. 1940, ch. 254, §
118, as amd. by L. 1973, ch. 346, § 4; L. 1973, ch. 414, §
5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
